node.title: Alcohol-fuelled violence on New Year's Eve swamps Kimberley frontline workers
node.alt: two Indigenous people stand off with fists raised in a car park
node.description: The surge across the Kimberley during the New Year's Eve long weekend pushes frontline workers to the brink and forces temporary restrictions on retail sales.
node.content:
["A\u00a0surge\u00a0in alcohol-fuelled crime across the Kimberley during the New Year's Eve long weekend has pushed frontline workers to the brink and angered residents who woke up to violence outside their homes.", "A steady stream of injuries and arrests from a night of relentless\u00a0brawling in Kununurra overwhelmed paramedics, hospital staff and police officers for hours on New Year's Eve.", "The fighting\u00a0continued overnight into the morning of\u00a0New Year's Day on Flametree Street.", "The ABC has seen a\u00a0confronting video taken by a witness in full daylight showing as many as 30 young men\u00a0involved.", "A long-term resident on the street\u00a0spoke to the ABC, on the\u00a0condition of anonymity, about the regular occurrence of all-night street parties, binge drinking and fighting on Flametree Street.", "He said the street was a magnet for outsiders looking for trouble, often from outlying communities or other areas of Kununurra.", "\"There were\u00a0two different fights going on. One person would drop and the next would walk up,\" he said.", "\"Turkey Creek (Warmun) versus\u00a0Kununurra mob.\"", "", "
Empty alcohol bottles could be found scattered across the footpath on Flametree Street after the New Year's Eve weekend.(ABC News: Ted O'Connor)
", "
Charges laid over brawl
", "Kununurra police have charged three people over the violence on Flametree Street\u00a0and believe that number will increase.", "Senior Sergeant Brett Pengilly said the offences ranged from disorderly conduct to being\u00a0armed in public to cause fear.", "\"Anti-social and criminal behaviour like what was witnessed on Weaber Plain\u00a0Road just after midnight on New Year's Eve and Flametree Street on New Year's Day is not tolerated in this or any other community,\" he said.", "
Wave of violence in Derby
", "", "
Despite liquor restrictions and laws targeting sly grogging, alcohol abuse remains a persistent issue across the Kimberley.(ABC News: Erin Parke)
", "In Derby, police attended more than 50 alcohol-fuelled family violence and\u00a0assault incidents on New Year's Eve alone.", "Senior Sergeant Dave Whitnell took to Facebook the following day to announce temporary alcohol restrictions, barring the sale of spirits\u00a0and full-strength beer.", "He told ABC Radio the restrictions had an immediate impact, giving\u00a0frontline workers some respite for the rest of the long weekend.", "\u201cThe level of our response was just unsustainable, given the amount of alcohol-fuelled violence we saw is not something we normally see,\u201d he said.", "\"Since the restrictions\u00a0police officers have attended no family violence or assault-type incidents.\"", "Amid the festive season\u00a0police across the Kimberley, especially in Fitzroy Crossing and Halls Creek, have also been grappling\u00a0with an increase in burglaries and stolen cars.", "Emotions were already running high in Derby over the safety of children in the town, after last week a video emerged of a young child smoking a bong as onlookers laughed."]
